document_data.mainbody:
Reinhar VIII was a king of the Arkaiuns of Dambrath.
The man who would rule as Reinhar VIII was the first son of King Reinhar VII. He was the father of Reinhar IX and at least four other sons.
Reinhar VIII was born in the Year of the Druids Wrath, 717 DR. He took his fathers throne and name upon the latters death in 750 DR. Reinhar VIII died in 801 DR, passing the throne to his son.
